title: Absolute focus/Transcendence
body:
Im a support main( mostly play yuumi with 80k mastery so far since she came out) I was always wondering whats the difference between Absolute focus and Transcendence and this is what i figured out, all builds have a simular build start with blue support starting item,twin shadows, cdr boots, and redemption with transcendence having ardent and banshie vail and absolute focus having deathcap and mejis
here's what i got 329 AP with transcendence with the cdr Subrune 319 AP with transcendence with the +9 subrune and 410 Ap with absolute focus with the two +9 adative dmg sub runes and 368 AP when below the absolute focus mark.

Note: this is all without stacking mejis, gaining gathering storm, and without w attachment on a ally

replies.body:
Are you referring to op.gg builds? Those are not builds so much as aggregates of popular combinations.

Seems really obvious, more CDR for a supportive build, and more AP for a poke-focused build.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hgU3QvQu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-07-23T20:17:14.042+0000)
>
> Are you referring to op.gg builds? Those are not builds so much as aggregates of popular combinations.
> 
> Seems really obvious, more CDR for a supportive build, and more AP for a poke-focused build.

nah im refurring to my own build i normally use out of all my game i normally go blue into redemption then twinshadow with cdr boots, sometimes i change it but that mainly my goto build
